metadata.title: Car Heater Defroster- Portable Car Space Heater, Windshield Defroster Defogger, Heating and Cooling Fan with 12V 150W Thermostat, 3-Outlet USB Plug in Cigarette Lighter for Car SUV Truck RV Trailer
features: 【Upgrade 2-in-1 Car Heater】Portable Car Heater Dual Mode: Heating and cooling, designed to quickly remove frost and fog from vehicle windshield. Keep cool in summer and warm in winter. Strengthen the air purification function to ensure that the air in the car is always comfortable.

【Fast heating, scientific cooling】MAYLONG This car heater has a reinforced mesh cover, which can quickly heat up in about 30 seconds. The scientifically designed large-area air outlet is convenient for heating, the air outlet is stable, and the temperature is more comfortable. It helps to quickly remove frost and fog from the windshield of your car, clear your sight effectively and instantly, and let you reach your destination smoothly.

【High-quality material ensures safety】Thickened and elongated alloy heating wire, low power consumption and long service life. The high-efficiency heating element does not damage the battery, the cigarette lighter plug is safer, and there is no hidden danger to the car line.

【Humanized Design】 180-degree rotating bracket bracket design, free adjustment, convenient and practical. You can adjust it to your liking and the swivel mount can be adjusted and easily guided like a car vent. The compact size makes this car heater easy to install and place in your car.

【Wide Compatibility】This car heater is widely used in cars, SUVs, taxis, jeeps, trucks and other common appliances. Suitable for all 12V vehicles in the car, car cigarette lighter heater with car ceramic heater fan for truck, camping and travel, defogging/defrosting in winter, keeping cool in summer.
description: remove frost, fog and even snow on the car windshield effectively and instantly, keep the sight of the windshield clear, ensure the security of the drivers and passengers.  It is suitable for car, camping, travel and keeping warm in winter. Cooling the car with stronger cool wind in summer.  Such a humanized gadgets, why not bring it home now?

1. 30 seconds rapid heating. 2. Heating & Cooling Fan 2 in 1, with hot and cold switch. 3. Air purification function. 4. Fit for all 12V Vehicle Cars 5. Compact size, portable and convenient to install. 6. Defrost, defogger, demister and snow remove in winter, keep cool in summer. 7. Reinforcement net cover design, durable high temperature resistance. 8. Thick and lengthened alloy heating wire, low power consumption, long service time. 9. Large area air outlet in scientific design, convinient and quickly to heating. 10. High efficiency heating element, no damage battery, no hot line, no hidden danger to the car line, cigarette lighter plug is safer. 11. 180 degree swivel bracket holder, free adjustment, convenient and practical.  12. Ideal for long trips or camping.
Material: ABS Plastic + Lacquer Color: Black Voltage: 12V Wattage: 150W Dimension: 6.0 x 3.2 x 4.8 inches Cable Length: 1.2m / 47.24" Package Weight: 255g

1. The vehicle should be around 15amp, the heater will worked fine. Much less than 15amp, the heater maybe stop working. If so, please adjust your vehicle voltage. 2. Its angle can be adjusted according to your preference, as it has tilting or swiveling base.Furthermore, it has adjustable angle mounting base. 3. Please allow 1-3cm error due to manual measurement. Thanks for your understanding.
